biography.summary: Jerry Moran is an American politician serving as United States Senator from Kansas since 2011. A Republican, he previously served in the United States House of Representatives from 1997 to 2011.

contact.office_address: 521 Dirksen Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Elected to U.S. House of Representatives from Kansas' 1st district.
Term renewed as Senate member representing Kansas.
